featured.text: Some kindergartens have adopted teaching methods along blood group lines, and even major companies reportedly make decisions about assignments based on an employee’s blood type.
In one study, nearly 600 children from kindergarten to sixth grade took part in a nutrition curriculum intended to get them to eat more vegetables and whole grains.

definition.zh_def: 幼稚園：為學齡前兒童提供的教育機構，通常針對3至6歲的孩子。
definition.en_def: A preschool educational institution for children typically aged 3 to 6 years.
definition.example: My daughter loves going to kindergarten every day.
